Breakingviews TV: Citi heat 1:14pm EDT - 04:36
ValueAct Capital has bought a stake in the $180 billion Citigroup. Antony Currie and Richard Beales explore what an activist investor might achieve at a highly regulated U.S. lender – or whether Citi’s relatively weak valuation metrics mean its shares are simply a bargain. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
